name: Weight Watchers
what_you_do: Medium is a platform that allows individuals to share their stories and ideas, fostering a community for thoughtful conversation and insight.
who_you_serve: Medium serves a diverse audience of writers and readers, including software developers, amateur novelists, product designers, and CEOs, who are looking to share and learn from human stories.
bio: Over 100 million people connect and share their wisdom on Medium every month, supported by a community of over a million Medium members.
